data.title: Innovation Agency Search on Agency Spotter
data.meta_description: Looking for the top Innovation agencies? Evaluate all 141 agencies based on client reviews and more. ✓ Click for the Top 12!
data.text:
NEXT/NOW

Innovation

(1)

WE CREATE DIGITAL EXPERIENCES FOR PHYSICAL SPACES - NEXT/NOW is a creative technology agency that produces next-generation digital/physical experiences for world-class brands. We use virtual reality, natural user interfaces, gesture and motion interactivity, innovative display concepts, and breakthrough technology to create unforgettable moments of connection between people and organizations. Our team hails from diverse disciplines, spanning brand development, museum management, and computer science to high-level video game development. Our focus on creating new approaches to existing challenges ensures an aura of innovation runs through our studio. Our proprietary code-base allows rapid prototyping of new-to-the-world concepts. Our integrated physical prototyping shop ensures a seamless interplay between digital and real-world elements. Our creative philosophy begins with a deep respect for our clients brand and audience. Every idea, emotion, innovation, and execution builds upon that foundation. Our insistence on best-in-class creative and development processes and formalized user testing ensures a ‘no surprises’ launch of projects and initiatives. We believe the future belongs to those who create it.

Momentum Design Lab

Innovation

(5)

INNOVATIVE. USER FOCUSED. SILICON VALLEY, NYC, LONDON - Momentum is an award winning Silicon Valley, New York City, & London based user experience design & development agency serving startups to the Fortune 500. Our services include - Research, Product Strategy, Design, and Development. We specialize in: + Product innovation for Enterprise/SaaS & Consumer web & mobile + Customer experience design + Digital transformation IN THE BUSINESS OF BUSINESS TRANSFORMATION With clients in categories like Enterprise Software, Consumer Software, Financial Services, Retail, Healthcare, Ad Tech, DevOps, etc., Momentum looks at the totality of a client’s enterprise and develops solutions that can have impact on how their clients do business. From AI to Blockchain to IoT to cloud-based app development, we help our customers in ways that go well beyond conventional marketing tools. TRANSFORMATIVE EXPERIENCES Because word of mouth often begins online, we believe we can be an agent of change not just for your marketing, but for the entire online customer experience. We offer design thinking-based and technology driven services in digital product innovation, customer experience management, and digital transformation. TECHNOLOGY DRIVEN Our team of expert, UX/CX strategists, designers and developers are passionate about technology and dedicated to helping solve complex business problems through our expertise in human-centered design, data science, personalization, and software engineering. Global clientele in: San Francisco, London, Santa Clara, Austin, Los Angeles, Dallas, Seattle, Portland, Paris, Singapore, San Diego, Vancouver, Chicago, Hong Kong, Salt Lake City, Washington D.C., Tokyo, Boston, San Jose, Toronto, Miami, Detroit, Philadelphia, Mexico City, Atlanta, Berlin, Amsterdam, Houston, and Irvine.

Fusion Media Inc

Innovation

(2)

GREAT DESIGN DRIVES BUSINESS. - You are one of a kind and you deserve solutions unique to your business. From startups to the Fortune 500, we'll be by your side. Our goal is to help you deliver your story through custom design solutions, and to unlock your potential for success. By combining Strategic Consulting, Integrated Marketing, and User Experience our solutions are designed to help you take your business to the next level. Whether you're looking for a new or updated brand strategy, a sleek and easy to use digital experience, or professional video services, we've got you covered. Every member of our team is ready to help you accomplish what you need most. We are professionals with the passion, experience, and determination to take on any challenge that comes our way. Your message is everything. Let's shape your story into a compelling experience together.

nimbhl: Industrial Design Studio

Innovation

(1)

ABOUT WELCOME TO NIMBHL - YOUR PARTNER FOR BRINGING PHYSICAL PRODUCT IDEAS TO LIFE! - At nimbhl, we believe that perspective is the ultimate edge. We work with entrepreneurs, start-ups, existing businesses, and stakeholders to turn product visions into reality. Through collaboration, creativity, and cutting-edge technology, we specialize in industrial design and engineering to deliver high-quality, functional, and aesthetically pleasing products that meet unique client needs. Our Approach: Collaborative Innovation: We partner closely with our clients, leveraging our expertise and their insights to bring their product ideas to life. Our collaborative approach ensures that every aspect of the product is meticulously designed and engineered, from concept to consumer. Custom Solutions: Whether you're a start-up, an existing business, or a stakeholder in need of a custom solution, our team of industrial designers and engineers can help you achieve your goals. We tailor our services to meet your specific requirements and deliver innovative, consumer-focused products that stand out in today's competitive marketplace. Market-Ready Products: We understand the importance of creating market-ready products. Our team ensures that every product we design and develop is not only visually appealing but also functional, reliable, and ready for the market. We are committed to delivering tangible, marketable products that exceed our clients' expectations. Partner with nimbhl to turn your physical product idea into a reality. Let us bring our expertise, creativity, and cutting-edge technology to help you design and develop products that make a difference in the world. +1 2133402472 https://nimbhl.com

Rubrik

Innovation

(1)

RUBRIK MAKES HERO'S. BE A HERO. HIRE RUBRIK - Rubrik is an design & innovation consultancy that crafts solutions to our client's business challenges. Our toolbox is extensive and our process is tailored to the specific needs of each individual challenge. We help you deliver products and services that are meaningful to the market, impact business and demand an important place in the minds of customers. We connect the dots as well as create the dots with you. We formulate tangible solutions that help increase product, service, experience and brand relevance to make you win.

RBLS

Innovation

(1)

ABOUT US - RBLS is a digital innovation agency that has developed a research based Enterprise Innovation Planning (EIP) system that enables complex organisations to become radical innovators. Through our EIP system enterprises will be able to increase their ability to make faster strategic decisions, build better MVP's based on customer needs, cultivate new ideas that co-evolve with early adaptors and critics and create collective intelligence to learn as a whole. Our EIP is based on 10 years of academic research in the fields of i.a. complex systems and -embodiment, Actor Network Theory and management innovation strategies.

Intergalactic Agency Inc.

Innovation

ABOUT US - INNOVATION TECH AGENCY - Intergalactic Agency Inc. is a leading technology innovation agency that specializes in combining advanced technologies & concepts (AI/ML, AR/VR/XR, Web3/NFT, IoT) to deliver cutting-edge custom solutions for brands and enterprise clients. Since our inception in 2004, we have worked with Fortune 500 clients across various industries on 1200+ solutions globally. We offer our clients a unique and proven methodology that combines our expertise in design, development and project management with management consulting to guide clients from strategy all the way to launch. Our projects include industry-first product solutions, experiential brand activations, and bespoke enterprise applications.
